content: tangled poets pickle jar kits are meant to be easy plug and play patterns fun scrappy type projects for those who don t have a huge stash but want the look they travel easy the wee skeins are small enough that they don t need to be wound just plunk them around your jar it s heavy enough to avoid a tangled mess inspired by the basic asymmetrical basic shaped shawls we wanted to add all the pops of colour finished size of this project is 108 inch wingspan and the deepest point is approx 22 inches gauge is not essential for this project pickle jar kits are available exclusively at www aberdeenswool ca
